description:
It's an simple but powerful and intuitive piece of software. If you wanna try an very interesting CAD-softawre you're right here.

I love it and wish all the best to the developers to improve this project!

Agree with the other reviewer. Great beginner paramteric software if the other BIG name cad software is not an option. As a amateur I like it because on youtube there's guy who is an excellent teacher with a series that progresses all the wayto advance . Plus it's flatpak
summary: Offline CAD when nothing else on flatpak

description: It's very simple and intuitive. I'm having fun with it, which isn't something I can say with many CAD software packages.
Simpel, man muss erst den Konstruktionsbaum checken, bis man es kann, aber es ist an sich ein kleveres kleines Programm
За вес чуть меньше 10 мБ получаю удобный САПР для простых поделок (корпуса). Думаю это очень даже хорошо!
